original_text: The master then sent a third servant to the farmers. They hurt him badly too, and they threw him out of the garden.
korean_text: 다시 세 번째 종을 보내니 이 종도 상하게 하고 내쫓은지라

sentences.original_text: The master then sent a third servant
sentences.korean_translation: 주인은 그때 세 번째 종을 보냈고

sentences.original_text: and they threw him out of the garden
